scene_description_enriched: A bearded male figure, identified as Saint Benedict by his halo and monastic habit, stands holding an open book. He wears a brown hooded robe over a blue and white striped tunic. Beside him, to the right, is a brown bull, depicted with golden stripes and small white horns. The background is a vibrant blue dotted with gold flecks, suggesting a celestial or divine setting. The scene is framed by a black border, and below it, a line of text is visible.
